data.title: Adam R. Cupp
data.meta_description: CLARIDON TWP. – Adam R. Cupp, age 38, of Claridon Township, died Oct. 15, 2017, in Columbus, Ohio. Born June 10, 1979, in Claridon, he was a lifelong area resident. A graduate of Berkshire High School, Adam owned and operated Outdoor Illusions Landscaping Company. He enjoyed being outside, working on trucks and riding his 4-wheeler.
data.meta_site_name: Geauga County Maple Leaf | Your News Resource in Geauga County
data.text:
CLARIDON TWP. – Adam R. Cupp, age 38, of Claridon Township, died Oct. 15, 2017, in Columbus, Ohio.

Born June 10, 1979, in Claridon, he was a lifelong area resident.

A graduate of Berkshire High School, Adam owned and operated Outdoor Illusions Landscaping Company.

He enjoyed being outside, working on trucks and riding his 4-wheeler.

He is survived by his son, Austin; mother, Jan (Harold) Kellogg; father, Barry (Jackie) Cupp; siblings, CJ Kellogg, Aaron Kellogg and Jill Giel; and grandparents, Nancy Winters, Delbert and Carol Cupp.

He was preceded in death by his sister, Trina Nick; and grandfather, James R. Winters.

Private family burial will be held.

The family suggests donations to the Austin Cupp Scholarship Fund, c/o any Chase Bank.
